chatbot.greeting: Hello {{username}}! I'm Lucy, your BodegaCat virtual assistant.
chatbot.help: How can I help you discover the world of NYC bodega cats today?

suggestions.catOfTheDay: Show me the cat of the day

responses.greeting: Hi there! I'm Lucy, your virtual assistant for all things bodega cats.
responses.findBodega: You can find nearby bodegas by visiting our Explorer page where you can search by neighborhood or view our interactive map.
responses.catOfTheDay: Today's featured cat is Whiskers from Sunny Corner Deli in Brooklyn! Check out the Cats page to see more adorable bodega cats.
responses.fundraiser: We have several active fundraisers to help bodega cats! You can donate through our Fundraising page. 100% of proceeds go to spay/neuter and care programs.
responses.passport: The BodegaCat Passport is our rewards program! Visit bodegas, meet cats, and earn stamps. Collect enough to unlock special benefits and discounts.

chatbot.fallback: I'm not sure how to help with that yet. Please try asking about bodegas, cats, fundraisers, or the passport program.
